website_summaries.verdict: The Bose SoundTrue On-Ear is a very comfortable everyday-use headphone that sounds good and collapses into a very compact carrying case.
pros: The Bose SoundTrue On-Ear headphones are lightweight, very comfortable, sound good, and fold up to fit into a very compact carrying case (included), which makes them very travel-friendly
You also get a detachable headphone cord and an Apple-friendly inline remote and microphone
cons: The fidelity comes up short on bass resonance

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for headphones for awhile now, and have tried many options. I have an ear for music (thanks to many years of being in band class), and have struggled with good sound quality in headphones or earbuds. I finally bit the bullet and ordered these Bose headphones, and think it may have been the best purchase I've made this year. You cannot beat the quality of Bose listening devices. The carrying case also makes it easy to pack up and take with you. These are not noise canceling, but the way the earphones cover your ears makes them do a good job of canceling noise anyway. No need to spend extra on the noise canceling varieties.
customer_reviews.author: Kmags

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They are good, not great. I was expecting better sound quality though because I have had Bose products in the past and they were great. I have to turn my music up kinda loud to really enjoy the sound. Also if you turn the music up sort of loud other people will be able to hear your music. If you are someone who enjoys booming bass like I do these headphones don't really do the job. They're decent but if they were to break I probably would not replace them with another pair.
customer_reviews.author: TS914

customer_reviews.title: but I love these because headphones always looked so stupid on me ...
customer_reviews.text: I am female with a small head, so I can understand why these may be small for some people, but I love these because headphones always looked so stupid on me just for that reason. Even with my small head I have to extend them a little to fit. And if you like the Bose sound, as I do, then these are a great investment. Much more comfortable than the Beats I bought the first time. I wear glasses, and the Beats hurt after awhile. Not these.
customer_reviews.author: craz3z

customer_reviews.title: Sadly...
customer_reviews.text: These were awesome for about 27-hours. At that point the connector completely ripped off by setting my phone down. I really have no idea how it even could have tore a wire so easily. Anyway, it's a great set and I am a huge Bose fan. However, I simply cannot recommend these even for someone who sits at a desk all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This would be a 5 star ratings if it wasn't for the fact I payed for a new set and a used set was delivered to me. But for the 30 minutes I had the headphones they were truely amazing. The were extremely light and comfortable on the ear. I own a pair of around the ear Bose SoundTrue so I wasn't expecting any kind of upgrade. I was proven wrong these sound way better then the around the ear set and they do a great job of blockIng outside noise. If I could do it over again I would have purchased two sets of on the ear instead of one around the ear and one on the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound. Great Comfort. Decent Price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on Amazon Prime Day. Then bough two more the week after because we were all fighting over them. I'm not a big fan of on-ear headphones but sometimes you just know the sound will be better - these do not disappoint. They fold up in the case pretty well but we mainly use them around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Erica J Rader

customer_reviews.title: I like this pair slightly less than my previous over-ear style ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Bose headphones. I like this pair slightly less than my previous over-ear style headphones because these press hard on my temples when wearing glasses. If you wear glasses you may want to look elsewhere. Sound quality and build are great though, 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Look, sound, and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot rave how amazing these sound. I'm not audiophile, but dang, these sound amazing. I thought I could only get great sound from over the ear headphones, but I am surely mistaken! I also have a lot of trouble wearing headphones since they make my ears hurt after a while, but these are super comfy as well!
customer_reviews.author: D. Heefner

customer_reviews.title: Bose is the best.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a gift.There have been no complaints so far. Great sounding headphones.
customer_reviews.author: KEITH KING

customer_reviews.title: Work Well
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use at the gym. So far so good (after 2 weeks). Very good sound quality while connected to the TV audio at PF on the elliptical. Also, blocks out the ambient noise from the overhead music about 90% (which is fine) Good buy for the price (~$90) at Christmas time.

customer_reviews.title: All Good.
customer_reviews.text: Wifey happy I am happy. Though she is not much of a headphone fan she seems to enjoy and says it is comfortabe watching re-runs of Friends. Good product.

(Long flight) The white design make them look very classy. I like them! I am very happy I bought them!

I have noticed 2 points that you need to know; 1) no noise cancellation for this model 2) even if they're comfortable but if you used them for an hour, you would feel pain and discomfort. Anyhow, overall I think it worth buying.

So much smaller and softer than noise canceling headphones and so much more comfortable than earbuds, these are a nice, portable alternative when traveling, and a nice choice for someone who has never worn any kind of head/earphones but who would like to listen to the radio or to a book in privacy!

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality; poor privacy.
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased these pricey headphones, I expected the best in terms of sound quality. I got that. They sound amazing, and the super long cord is a nice touch. One criticism which can't be ignored though: as you raise the volume, these become a high quality set of *speakers*. They don't hold sound in and are not good for privacy. I intended to use these at the office but I can't. Luckily I have a use for them at home.

customer_reviews.title: Bose Soundtrue review
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very comfortable to wear. Headphones are small and compact. Sound is good for all types of music. Cons: Slight sound leakage. It can take some time to adjust the headphones to fit. Overall, a very comfortable pair of headphones which offers a very neutral sound.

customer_reviews.title: I thought I was getting this great deal buy went back to order the right ones ...

Could have sworn I ordered the right ones but prime day was confusing to me. I thought I was getting this great deal buy went back to order the right ones I wanted and they were cheeper then on prime day.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica paukert

customer_reviews.title: ear pain after using for prolonged period of time
customer_reviews.text: The look is pretty good. Sound is OK for me. The only problem I have with this on-ear headphone is that whenever I use it for more than 30 minutes, I will experience ear pain. It could just be that my head is too big, but just want to give you guys some heads-up. It seems that you can't adjust the width. So if you are not picky about sound quality, and you have a relatively small head (say compared to Asian guys), then this product is OK.
customer_reviews.author: Jing Yang

customer_reviews.title: Bose Brand Does Not Deliver
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my husband for Christmas. Five months later he can only hear through one of the speakers. The plug, which was very extended, has bent. His use has been very normal - using it with his iPad at home. Nothing that should have compromised the function. Given the Bose brand promise, this is quite a disappointment in quality.
customer_reviews.author: RI Girl

customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap, when I got it, part of the audio jack was peeling off, when i touched it it fell all the way off!

product_meta.title: Bose SoundTrue Headphones On-Ear Style, White for Apple iOS
product_meta.description: Powerful sound, lightweight design SoundTrue headphones feature an advanced acoustic design for clear, natural audio across the full spectrum—from vocalists who hit the high note, right down to a good bass line groove. Go ahead, lose yourself in music. A softly padded headband and memory foam ear cushions stay comfortable no matter how long your playlist is. Convenience and durability More than a statement in style, SoundTrue headphones are designed to provide lasting quality. The audio cable attaches to a single earcup for greater freedom of movement and less tangling. It also detaches for convenient storage. The earcups conveniently fold flat and the headband is collapsible. And the included carrying case makes for easy transport while displaying your design choice. In tune and in touch SoundTrue headphones are designed specifically for use with your iPhone and other Apple products. The integrated inline remote located on the back of the microphone, lets you control music functions—adjust volume, play/pause tracks, skip tracks forward/backward, fast forward/rewind and change playlists. You can also switch between calls and music with one–touch ease—all without reaching for your device. Many features are also compatible with today's most popular phones.
feature_bullets: Full and natural sound for all your music
Softly padded headband and memory foam cushions
Also available in an around-ear style. No Noise Cancelling feature.
SoundTrue headphones are designed specifically for use with your iPhone and other Apple products.
